name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-professional-development
title: Professional Development Plan Prompt
shortDescription: AI Builder prompt that outlines steps for career growth based on goals
longDescription: Outlines steps for career growth based on goals

metadata.value: Design a professional development plan for someone aiming to achieve the following career [milestones]. The plan should include goals and objectives, resources and tools and a timeline for activities. Format the plan to be concise and actionable and present the information in a clear easy-to-follow manner suitable for a junior level employee.
